Track web security compliance

Making government websites more secure

Track web security compliance is a web-based application that scans Government of Canada websites and web services and reports on their web security. The application can be found at https.canada.ca.

Track web security compliance is an open source application in the public domain adapted by the Canadian Digital Service from 18Fâ€™s project Pulse.

This tool is currently available for Government of Canada employees. This is what it looks like with demo data:

Learn more about the repositories in Code and repositories.

This project is maintained by the Canadian Digital Service and the Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat.

Hosted on GitHub Pages.
